post:
VPSVille is launching its winter VPS sale! Canadian VPS hosting at an affordable price! Now offering a 25% lifetime discount on new sign-ups until March 1st!
Don't miss this incredible opportunity to locate in a prime datacenter great prices!

Purchase any VPS plan (Value plans or Host-in-a-box) with the coupon code WINTER453 and recieve a lifetime 25% discount!

Get your new VPS on our enterprise grade hardware. Quad-core Xeons with 3Ware RAID, dual power supplies,
dual NIC's and dual switching, our servers do not fail. We do not host your valuable data on consumer grade equipment!

All of our VPS's enjoy the following features:

  • Fast connection and low latency to your Canadian and international customers.
  • Located at 151 Front St. West in Toronto.
  • Your files and sites will be HOSTED IN CANADA.
  • 100% Uptime! We compensate you if we experience downtime.
  • Satisfaction guaranteed, or your money back.
  • Enterprise grade servers with SuperMicro motherboards, Seagate disks, ECC memory and 3Ware RAID controllers.
  • 100mbit internet uplink.
  • We do not oversell disk, cpu or memory resources.

Terms:

  • These discounts apply to the packages listed in this posting.
  • Available for NEW order only. (For new and existing customers.)
  • Coupon code must be supplied at time of order.
  • Offer expires on March 1st.
  • Prices include applicable taxes.

All plans come loaded with:

+ 4 Xeon CPU's
+ 100mb port
+ Full root access
+ Choice of OS
+ No Setup Fee's
